Custom VIP Packages to the 2022 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix

Roadtrips’ 2022 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix packages are custom-crafted to allow our guests to enjoy an experience that is designed perfectly to their preferences. Our luxury travel packages are curated with top hotels including the Ritz-Carlton Abu Dhabi and the Rosewood Abu Dhabi; prime race viewing options (from premium grandstand seating to the paddocks with perks like driver appearances and pit tours); pre-travel personal concierge services, and many more custom options.

For the ultimate Abu Dhabi Grand Prix experience, our team can arrange access to the legendary Amber Lounge parties, some of the most exclusive events of the weekend. Spend the night rubbing shoulders with the jet set on the Amber Lounge yacht, where luxury and style are infused with renowned Arabian hospitality. Popular amongst racing’s elite, Amber Lounge is the place to be and be seen. These upscale events are a highlight not only for drivers, but also for celebrities, models, and other VVIPs. The Amber Lounge yacht serves up an unforgettable experience and is the perfect way to celebrate this amazing event.

Whether traveling for leisure or entertaining clients, we’d love to be your host at this amazing international event. Custom 2022 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix packages available from $5,175 (premium grandstand seating) or $13,795 (exclusive hospitality) per person, based on double occupancy.

About the 2022 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix

The 2022 Abu Dhabi Grand Prix will mark the 14th running of this prestigious event. The race has become a huge draw, in large part due to its spectacular host city. Abu Dhabi, capital of the United Arab Emirates, is one of the Middle East’s hottest destinations. It has become a favorite of savvy travelers, though no other time of year generates as much attention or excitement as Grand Prix weekend. For race enthusiasts and followers of F1, the spectacular Yas Marina Circuit in Abu Dhabi is a gem. Add in the impressive facilities and development of the Yas Marina and you have one of the most impressive experiences on the circuit.
